name: Google Format

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - '*'         # matches every branch that doesn't contain a '/'
      - '*/*'       # matches every branch containing a single '/'
      - '**'        # matches every branch
      - '!main'     # excludes main
      - '!master'   # excludes master

jobs:
  call-workflow:
    uses: ./github-actions/.github/workflows/reusable-google-format.yml
    secrets: inherit
